artist: Artist: Richard Wilson; Publisher: Coracle Press, London
creditline: Gift of funds from William A. Graham IV
description: multi-edition of constructions (wind instruments) on paper trays, wood strips, metal, accompanied with photos of constructions assembled; with a portfolio of illustrations (P.80.67.8) in wooden (chestnut) box (P.80.67.9)
provenance: Martin S. Ackerman Foundation, New York; given to MIA, 1980.
title: Construction, from Wind Instruments
